function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Buildings constructed with traditional materials becoming more susceptible to mosquito intrusion.","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases, such as malaria and dengue fever.","Mitigation":"Use of mosquito-resistant materials and effective building design strategies.","Technologies":"Mosquito-resistant building materials, natural ventilation-driven design strategies.","People":"Inhabitants of buildings constructed with traditional materials.","Owner":"Architects, construction companies, building owners."},{"Description":"Stagnant water accumulation in excavated areas providing favorable sites for mosquito larvae to mature.","Impact":"Increased breeding grounds for mosquitoes, leading to higher risk of mosquito-borne diseases.","Mitigation":"Prompt draining of stagnant pools and integration of dewatering strategies.","Technologies":"Drainage systems, dewatering techniques.","People":"Construction workers, site managers, building owners.","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers."},{"Description":"Impact of indoor air quality and human comfort on the risk of malaria in retrofits, repairs, and building modifications.","Impact":"Potential increase in malaria risk due to poor indoor air quality and discomfort.","Mitigation":"Consideration of indoor air quality and human comfort in building modifications, retrofits, and repairs.","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, building materials with malaria mitigation properties.","People":"Inhabitants of retrofitted buildings, construction workers.","Owner":"Facilities management, building owners, construction companies."},{"Description":"Sharing proper techniques for installation and appropriate materials for piping to ensure long lifespan and minimal need for repair.","Impact":"Reduced risk of water-related diseases and building maintenance issues.","Mitigation":"Knowledge management framework for sharing installation techniques and material selection best practices.","Technologies":"Durable piping materials, knowledge management systems.","People":"Plumbing professionals, building maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facilities management, building owners, plumbing companies."}]}
